name: The Tales of Gummy Part I
name_original: The Tales of Gummy Part I
description:
In this game created entirely on Google Slides (with 560 total slides), you play as a man named Gummy who must collect gems to defeat the I.R.S. from repossessing his house! Can you help Gummy defeat monsters and audit goons before his life savings go down the drain?

Features include: working inventory system, combat system, cutscenes, puzzles.

To Play: Click the link, press the "Slideshow" or "Present" button in the top right corner. This will cause it to go fullscreen. Please don't just scroll through the game as it breaks after that action. The game can only be experienced fully if you point and click with a mouse/mousepad.

Part II in progress!
